title: Very thin geometric Bauhaus-like sans "bc" with exagerated 3D shadow
content:
I think I’ve seen this one in an old Letraset or Mecanorma catalogue somewhere, but I might very well be wrong. Anybody have an idea?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040248im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bc_logo_6609.gif)

 [‹ Virtual Logo Typeface ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040248/http:/typophile.com/node/48795 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Display font w/ 1920s woman in scarf - Via Face Don Black {Mili} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040248/http:/typophile.com/node/37820 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Bald Condensed
